name: OSL
introduce: OSL is Asia's leading digital asset platform which provides brokerage, custody, exchange and software-as-a-service (SaaS) for institutional clients and professional investors. brokerage, custody, exchange and software-as-a-service (SaaS) for institutional clients and professional investors. OSL is the first company to be granted types 1 & 7 digital asset licenses by the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission.
